item.description: Bring your friendly dog to our Valentine's mutt mix & mingle. When it's too cold to play outside, you can bring your dogs to an indoor play session to help cure that cabin fever. We have an indoor playroom specially designed for doggy play dates. All friendly dogs welcome to romp. All breeds of dogs welcome. Fill your dog's day with energy-burning fun and relaxation among friends. (there is no charge for this meet-up)
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk, meet-ups are held in the doggy daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Mutt Mix & Mingle Meet Up
